controllers

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GameMaster

  • public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object

    GameMaster Controller Object.

    this runs a simply RPG.

    Since:
    November 24, 2017
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Andres Hermilo Carrera

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean initiativeRolled
      this determines whether or not initiative has been rolled yet for the current game.
      private Monster jimmy
      this is the monster that will fight the players.
      private Hero[] players
      this is the collection of players in the current game session.
      private DiceBag steve
      this is the DiceBag object that the Game Master uses.
      private int totalTurns
      the total amount of turns that have already been run.

        this method sets a heros name of a randomly generated hero that has been approved by the user.
        Returns:
        returns a hero that has been approved and named by the user.

        generates a hero based on randomly rolled attributes.
        Returns:
        returns a randomly generated hero.

        this method calculates the amount of potions dropped and adds it to the current player in the appropriate array.

        private java.lang.String getName()
        this method prompts the user for a name of the hero and if not given one it returns "The Unnamed Hero"
        Returns:
        returns a name for the hero.

        private int calculateAttr()
        calculates an attributes based on a dice rolling recipe.
        Returns:
        returns the number for an attribute calculated.

        this method generates a monster based on a choice made on the user.

        private void performAction(Hero player,
                           TurnAction action)
        this method take in a player and action and does the requested action.
        Parameters:
        player - the current player who is directly affected by the action.
        action - the action that was chosen.

      • rollInitiative

        private void rollInitiative()
        this method rolls and sets the initiative of every monster in the game.

      • displayMenuChoice

        private TurnAction displayMenuChoice(boolean healthPots,
                                     boolean manaPots)
        a method to display a menu with specific actions depending on if there are any health potions or mana potions.
        Parameters:
        healthPots - a boolean that determines whether or not there was any health potions.
        manaPots - a boolean that determines whether or not there were any mana potions.
        Returns:
        returns a TurnAction enum.

      • playerUsePotion

        private java.lang.String playerUsePotion(Hero player,
                                         Type type)
        this method uses a potion and creates an output string based on how much it restored the specified stat.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that will use the potion.
        type - the type of potion that will be used
        Returns:
        returns a string detailing a player using a potion of the specified type and how much that restored the corresponding stat

      • attackEnemy

                                     Monster defender,
                                     int attack)
        this runs an attack and checks whether or not the attack landed and if it was super-effective or not.
        Parameters:
        attacker - attacking monster.
        defender - defending monster.
        attack - the damage from the attack.
        Returns:
        returns a string of detailing an attack on a defender.

      • damageString

        private java.lang.String damageString(java.lang.String attacker,
                                      java.lang.String defender,
                                      int damage)
        this creates and returns a string detailing an attack on a defender.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the attackers name.
        defender - the defenders name.
        damage - the amount of damage done.
        Returns:
        returns a string of the detailing an attack on a defender with the amount of damage.

      • displayGameInfo

        private void displayGameInfo()
        displays the current game info by printing out each players full inventory, attributes, and state. it also displays the current monsters state.
